data.text:
Okay, pumpkins, bell peppers, and corn… 
Yup, we've got everything they've asked for!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Okay, pumpkins, bell peppers, and corn… 
<story>Yup, we've got everything they've asked for!

data.text:
Thanks for keeping track of the shopping list Chiyo-chan♪ 
I'm getting so excited for the barbeque at the end of 
the summer camp!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Thanks for keeping track of the shopping list Chiyo-chan♪ 
<story>I'm getting so excited for the barbeque at the end of 
<story>the summer camp!

data.text:
I'm also excited! After all, summer and barbeque always 
go together! And when you think of barbeque you think 
of your class president!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I'm also excited! After all, summer and barbeque always 
<story>go together! And when you think of barbeque you think 
<story>of your class president!

data.text:
Let's all work together to follow the rules and make sure 
no one gets burnt! Let's eat our fill and have heaps of fun!! 
Hahahahaha!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Let's all work together to follow the rules and make sure 
<story>no one gets burnt! Let's eat our fill and have heaps of fun!! 
<story>Hahahahaha!

data.text:
That being said, we still haven't bought carrots. 
Are we really going to be okay without some?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>That being said, we still haven't bought carrots. 
<story>Are we really going to be okay without some?

data.text:
I heard that they were bringing them 
by the truckload directly to the campsite!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>I heard that they were bringing them 
<story>by the truckload directly to the campsite!

data.text: Oh, I see!
data.name: Both
data.processed: <story>Oh, I see!

data.text:
But anyways, as Baku-chan said, we need 
to make sure to eat a bunch and have fun! So…
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>But anyways, as Baku-chan said, we need 
<story>to make sure to eat a bunch and have fun! So…

data.text:
When we get back to campus I need to work really hard. 
I still haven't made up for the time I missed in Spring 
due to my injury!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>When we get back to campus I need to work really hard. 
<story>I still haven't made up for the time I missed in Spring 
<story>due to my injury!

data.text:
Laurel-san… Please don't overdo it! I can tell you've been 
pushing yourself really hard during this Summer camp as well!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Laurel-san… Please don't overdo it! I can tell you've been 
<story>pushing yourself really hard during this Summer camp as well!

data.text:
Hehehe, don't worry about me♪ 
Chiyo-chan, you of all people should know that, right? 
After all, I'm good at dealing with injuries!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Hehehe, don't worry about me♪ 
<story>Chiyo-chan, you of all people should know that, right? 
<story>After all, I'm good at dealing with injuries!

data.text:
Woah! Look at that watermelon over there, it's so big and 
looks absolutely delicious! I bet everyone would be happy 
if we brought it back for them! Give me a second you two!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Woah! Look at that watermelon over there, it's so big and 
<story>looks absolutely delicious! I bet everyone would be happy 
<story>if we brought it back for them! Give me a second you two!

data.text: Mhm! That's how Laurel-san always is!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Mhm! That's how Laurel-san always is!!

data.text:
She's… so strong. She's always been like that, 
even before she came to the academy… 
Even when we trained together in the "Victory Club."
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>She's… so strong. She's always been like that, 
<story>even before she came to the academy… 
<story>Even when we trained together in the "Victory Club."

data.text:
"One must always be strong-willed!" 
"One must live full of positivity and energy!" 
That's what all members of the Victory Club are taught!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>"One must always be strong-willed!" 
<story>"One must live full of positivity and energy!" 
<story>That's what all members of the Victory Club are taught!

data.text:
And of course our names are synonymous with strong flowers!! 
As such, "No matter the difficulty, one must always push through."
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>And of course our names are synonymous with strong flowers!! 
<story>As such, "No matter the difficulty, one must always push through."

data.text:
We must always have fortitude. 
And in that respect, Laurel is second to none…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>We must always have fortitude. 
<story>And in that respect, Laurel is second to none…

data.text: Baku-chan, Chiyo-chan, sorry for making you wait!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Baku-chan, Chiyo-chan, sorry for making you wait!

data.text:
Hehehe, their watermelons looked so delicious that I ended 
up buying a bunch! But don't worry, I'll carry them all back!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Hehehe, their watermelons looked so delicious that I ended 
<story>up buying a bunch! But don't worry, I'll carry them all back!

data.text:
Oh, also, if your bags get too heavy on our 
way back just let me know! I'll carry them for you♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Oh, also, if your bags get too heavy on our 
<story>way back just let me know! I'll carry them for you♪

data.text: Wait, Laurel-san! I'm still worried about you!!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>Wait, Laurel-san! I'm still worried about you!!

data.text:
Hey… come here for a sec. 
Isn't that girl's plate lookin' a little empty, 
why don't we give her some more carrots…?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>Hey… come here for a sec. 
<story>Isn't that girl's plate lookin' a little empty, 
<story>why don't we give her some more carrots…?

data.text:
No way no way!! That girl… isn't she 
from that like super famous Grand Family…!?
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>No way no way!! That girl… isn't she 
<story>from that like super famous Grand Family…!?

data.text: Thank you for the meal.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>Thank you for the meal.

data.text:
Hey hey hey hey hey!! 
Milady, are you trying some of the foods!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hey hey hey hey hey!! 
<story>Milady, are you trying some of the foods!?

data.text:
I have just finished my meal. 
Therefore, I am leaving.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>I have just finished my meal. 
<story>Therefore, I am leaving.

data.text: Hold on, wait! M-Milady!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Hold on, wait! M-Milady!?

data.text:
I said hold on, weit! Why're you at the beach when we're havin' 
a rad BBQ!? You're gonna go for a swim!? I'm guessin' you 
wanted to swim so bad that you couldn't hold it in anymore?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>I said hold on, weit! Why're you at the beach when we're havin' 
<story>a rad BBQ!? You're gonna go for a swim!? I'm guessin' you 
<story>wanted to swim so bad that you couldn't hold it in anymore?

data.text:
I do not have any plans to swim… 
I simply wanted to do a bit of running after my meal.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>I do not have any plans to swim… 
<story>I simply wanted to do a bit of running after my meal.

data.text:
You're doin' some training!? Ehhh, for realz!? 
What about the BBQ!? What about the summer party!? 
You're not gonna come and get hyped!?!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>You're doin' some training!? Ehhh, for realz!? 
<story>What about the BBQ!? What about the summer party!? 
<story>You're not gonna come and get hyped!?!?

data.text:
I ate as much as was necessary already. 
You can feel free to return to your party though.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>I ate as much as was necessary already. 
<story>You can feel free to return to your party though.

data.text:
That's not the point!! Ungh, Milady, such a buzzkill… 
You're legit super ultra salty everyday!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>That's not the point!! Ungh, Milady, such a buzzkill… 
<story>You're legit super ultra salty everyday!!

data.text: Umm… are you done?
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>Umm… are you done?

data.text:
Wait, this isn't over yet! I'll never give up! 
Umm, well if you don't wanna join us for 
the BBQ, what about the watermelon splitting!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Wait, this isn't over yet! I'll never give up! 
<story>Umm, well if you don't wanna join us for 
<story>the BBQ, what about the watermelon splitting!?

data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>……!

data.text:
Hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh… 
Hmmmmh―!!
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh… 
<story>Hmmmmh―!!

data.text: Alright, that went well…
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed: <story>Alright, that went well…

data.text: Miracle-san… great work.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>Miracle-san… great work.

data.text:
Ruby! Huh, what about the barbeque…? 
Did you manage to get out of it? 
Ahaha, I guess I shouldn't be one to talk.
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Ruby! Huh, what about the barbeque…? 
<story>Did you manage to get out of it? 
<story>Ahaha, I guess I shouldn't be one to talk.

data.text: Your form… it was quite brilliant.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>Your form… it was quite brilliant.

data.text:
Really!? Thanks! That helps me 
feel more confident in my abilities.
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Really!? Thanks! That helps me 
<story>feel more confident in my abilities.

data.text: Is… that so?
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed: <story>Is… that so?

data.text: Anyways, Ruby, are you going for a run?
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed: <story>Anyways, Ruby, are you going for a run?

data.text:
That is correct. Even if it's our last day of 
this camp, we cannot neglect our training.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>That is correct. Even if it's our last day of 
<story>this camp, we cannot neglect our training.

data.text:
"Be brilliant. Be the best. And always shine the brightest." 
That is my family's motto… 
And as such I must adhere to that duty.
data.name: Daiichi Ruby
data.processed:
<story>"Be brilliant. Be the best. And always shine the brightest." 
<story>That is my family's motto… 
<story>And as such I must adhere to that duty.

data.text:
Got it. Umm, I know that it's a little different from 
what you're talking about, but… I have to win too. 
I need to repay all of the people that saved me.
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Got it. Umm, I know that it's a little different from 
<story>what you're talking about, but… I have to win too. 
<story>I need to repay all of the people that saved me.

data.text:
Uwaaah!! Miracle, Milady, what're you two doin'!? 
We're s'posed to be havin' fun!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Uwaaah!! Miracle, Milady, what're you two doin'!? 
<story>We're s'posed to be havin' fun!!

data.text:
Helios! Ahahaha, you're always so energetic! 
But don't worry about me, I'm having a blast right now!
data.name: K.S. Miracle
data.processed:
<story>Helios! Ahahaha, you're always so energetic! 
<story>But don't worry about me, I'm having a blast right now!

data.text:
Hehe… The wind is breathing in new life. 
A noble, heavenly wind. An earnest, dry wind. A cheerful gale.
data.name: Yamanin Zephyr
data.processed:
<story>Hehe… The wind is breathing in new life. 
<story>A noble, heavenly wind. An earnest, dry wind. A cheerful gale.

data.text:
However, I will be the breeze that sweeps them all away. 
Ahh… I can already smell the end of summer.
data.name: Yamanin Zephyr
data.processed:
<story>However, I will be the breeze that sweeps them all away. 
<story>Ahh… I can already smell the end of summer.

title: And It Begins In The Blink Of An Eye
